data.title: Erik Sundquist

data.text:
Erik Jorn Sundquist is a European actor.

Biography[]

Little is known of Sundquist's life outside of his career, which began in 2008 with a TV movie appearance. He lives in Los Angeles and has received one nomination for his work.

On Criminal Minds[]

Sundquist played ephebophilic serial rapist, abductor, serial killer, and the dominant half of a husband-and-wife killing team Robert Reimann in the Season Five episode "Cradle to Grave".

Filmography[]

Notorious Nick (2021) - Erroll

Ty (2020) Short - Darren

Carrion (2020) - General Gregarin

Pipe Dream (2019) Short - Carol's father (also executive producer)

War Path (2019) - Eric Daley (was nominated for Best Villain Short Or Feature)

One Against the House (2019) - Paul

Studio 12 (2017) TV Short - Don

Laundromat (2016) Short - Dr. Rod Sterling

The Last Smile (2016) Assassin #1

Tracks (2015) Short - Tommy's Dad

Hush the TV Series (2014) - Dr. Earle

Troubles (2014) Short - John Seamus (also writer and producer)

Seeker & Fetch (2011) - Thief

A Mother's Story (2011) - Eugene

A Cure for Dead - 2 episodes - Arlin

I (Almost) Got Away with It - 1 episode (2011) - U.S. Marshall

Freudian Slip (2009) Short - The Husband

Criminal Minds - "Cradle to Grave" (2009) TV episode - Robert Reimann

Maalaala Mo Kaya - 1 episode (2009) - Mort

Cosmic Conflict: The Origin of Evil (2009) Short - Lucifer/Satan

The Killing of Mary Surratt (2009) Short - Frederick Aiken

Crucifixion (2008) TV Movie - Thief on the Cross

[]
